name: The Island Project
description:
The Island Project is an ongoing personal exercise in environmental game art, level design, and atmospheric effects. 

Although builds are free to play, I do humbly ask that you consider leaving a tip if you enjoy the experience. Any contributions you can spare make all the difference.

Please see the Game Manual post in the Community forum for references to inputs, options, and other settings available in The Island Project.

Thank you for playing!
